text: @thehill It’s okay to lie to FBI. CORONAVIRUS is HOAX. Inject disinfectants. Chew CLOROX. Don’t wear masks. “LIBERATE” United States. Trump is Kicking COV-D 19’S but!  Only 75,000 have died out of 350,000,000 Americans. God bless our spiritual leader ...Donald
